name: Royal Masque
title: Past Splendor: Royal Masque
desc: "In that golden age, the nobles shared with the people their knowledge and profits.\nBut the later nobles were seduced by power. Their banquets were exclusively for their own pleasure."
in_play_description: After the character to which this is attached uses an Elemental Burst: Your next character deals +1 DMG during this Round. (Once per Round)

skills.desc:
After the character to which this is attached uses an Elemental Burst: Your next character deals +1 DMG during this Round. (Once per Round)
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
